metaTags.metaDescription: The Cloudflare Developer Platform product offering has everything you need to deliver serverless applications.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Learn how to reduce, or even eliminate, egress fees with Cloudflare.

relatedBlades.title: Developer Platform
relatedBlades.subtitle: Agility and resilience on a connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.copy:
- Scalable computing to power the logic of your application.
- Store session state and/or objects in a distributed environment.
- Composable and programmable architecture for building serverless applications.
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Ready to talk to an expert? Click here to get in touch.](https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/enterprise/contact/)

features.title: Improve user experiences everywhere
features.description: Get the lowest latency with greater control when code is automatically deployed to all %{DataCenterCount} global locations.

features.title: Boost productivity and innovation
features.description: Build, deploy, and deliver trusted applications everywhere without operational overhead. Developers get a straight line from writing to deploying code.

features.title: Transparent and competitive pricing
features.description: Reduce costs with generous free tiers, transparent pricing, and no egress fees.

relatedBlades.title: Build the next big thing
relatedBlades.copy: The developer platform gives you a rich ecosystem of foundational technology built on open source and open standards. You can choose to use all elements of the developer platform or only those you choose. Your architecture choices shouldn't be tied to a single vendor ecosystem.  When you have the freedom to choose, you're freed from costly cloud bills, sys-admin challenges, and configuration hassles freeing you to build the next big thing.

relatedBlades.title: A 'Leader' in The Forrester New Wave for Edge Development Platforms
relatedBlades.copy: Forrester Vice President, Principal Analyst, Jeffrey Hammond: Cloudflare "offers strong compute, data services and web development capabilities. Alongside Workers, Workers KV adds edge data storage. Pages, Stream and Images provide higher level platform services for modern web workloads. Cloudflare has an intuitive developer experience, fast, global deployment of updated code, and minimal cold start times."

buttonTwo.elementName: Compare Plans & Pricing developer platform enablement btn

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Remove setup and configuration headaches__ - Intelligent, automated deployment and infrastructure management, all done for you.
- __Reduce cloud storage spend__ - No vendor lock-in and no egrees fees.
- __Increase developer velocity__ - A developer experience without compromise.
Run workloads on our infinitely scalable global network.
relatedBlades.title: Build applications on the Cloudflare network
relatedBlades.subtitle: Compute Solutions

features.title: Cloudflare Workers
features.description: Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.

features.title: Cloudflare Email Routing
features.description: Create and manage custom email addresses for your domain.

buttonOne.elementName: Explore Workers in the playground - button

relatedBlades.copy: Storage solutions to meet your needs from storing session state to objects.
relatedBlades.title: Store your data on the Cloudflare network
relatedBlades.subtitle: Storage

features.title: R2 Object Storage
features.description: Create multi-cloud architectures with an S3-compatible distributed object storage

features.title: Workers KV
features.description: Build highly dynamic APIs and sites which respond as quickly as a cached static file would with our key-value store.

features.title: Durable Objects
features.description: Build stateful edge applications, such as chat rooms, shopping carts, or whiteboards, with a strongly consistent data store.

features.title: D1
features.description: Build natively serverless SQL databases of any size

features.title: Hyperdrive
features.description: Make your regional databases feel globally distributed

relatedBlades.copy: Give developers access to the best tooling possible to build, debug, and diagnose on the Cloudflare platform.
relatedBlades.title: Build blazing fast, trusted websites on the connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.subtitle: Website Development

features.title: Pages (JAMstack)
features.description: Create full-stack applications that are instantly deployed to the Cloudflare global network. Deployment requires minimal configuration with many decisions made automatically allowing you to innovate faster.

features.title: Stream
features.description: Ingest, encode, record, and play live or on-demand videos.

features.title: Images
features.description: Build a highly scalable image pipeline to resize, optimize, store, and deliver images.

relatedBlades.quote: Cloudflare aligns precisely with our ecommerce vision. With Cloudflare Workers, we eliminate the operational overhead of implementing and managing servers. That gives us more time to focus on the business.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties

buttonTwo.elementName: Compare Plans & Pricing developer platform enablement btn

relatedBlades.copy: With Workers you can deploy and run code from Cloudflare's global network. Build web functions and applications without the hassle of maintaining infrastructure. Workers is a part of the Cloudflare Developer Platform giving you compute, storage, and services to build and scale your application.
relatedBlades.title: Learn more about Workers

features.title: Built-with Workers
features.description: Built on Cloudflare: Explore what other companies are building with the Cloudflare Developer Platform.

features.title: Community of Developers
features.description: Join the Developers Discord. Share what you're building or ask questions with the Workers community and Cloudflare employees.

features.title: Start building today
features.description: After taking this Egghead course you'll be ready to start experimenting with your own Cloudflare Workers projects.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Announcing our Spring Developer Challenge
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Announcing our Spring Developer Challenge

features.description: Open source Firebase alternative and PostgreSQL database service that offers real-time functionality, database backups, and extensions.
MySQL-compatible platform that makes databases infinitely scalable, easier and safer to manage.
Fully managed serverless PostgreSQL separates storage and compute to offer features such as serverless, branching, and bottomless storage.
By using Workers and Turso, you can create applications that are close to your end users without having to maintain or operate infrastructure in tens or hundreds of regions.
Serverless database with Redis* and Kafka API. Upstash also offers QStash, a task queue/scheduler designed for the serverless.
Momento Cache is a low latency serverless caching solution that can be used on top of relational databases.
